text: ( Picture : Kim Kardashian / Instagram, Rex / Shutterstock ) Kylie Jenner celebrated her birthday with a star - studded cast, a glittery party and a mural with all her family members featured – well, all but her sister ’ s partner Tristan Thompson. The 21 - year - old commissioned a massive mural to be made of all her loved ones, including her sister Kourtney ’ s ex - boyfriend Scott Disick and Kendall ’ s boyfriend Ben Simmons, presenting the piece of art at her birthday celebrations in West Hollywood ’ s Delilah. Where was he? ( Picture : Kim Kardashian / Instagram ) Nope, not here ( Picture : Kim Kardashian / Instagram ) The father of her baby niece, however, was nowhere to be seen, suggesting
